018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.recorder;
019
020import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.utils.RowStatisticsConfigurationUtil.getInt;
021import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.utils.RowStatisticsConfigurationUtil.getLong;
022import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.utils.RowStatisticsTableUtil.NAMESPACED_TABLE_NAME;
023
024import com.lmax.disruptor.BlockingWaitStrategy;
025import com.lmax.disruptor.RingBuffer;
026import com.lmax.disruptor.TimeoutException;
027import com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.Disruptor;
028import com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.ProducerType;
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
032import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
033import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.BufferedMutator;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.BufferedMutatorParams;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Connection;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ConnectionConfiguration;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RetriesExhaustedWithDetailsException;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.RowStatisticsImpl;
041import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.ringbuffer.RowStatisticsDisruptorExceptionHandler;
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.ringbuffer.RowStatisticsEventHandler;
043import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.ringbuffer.RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope;
044import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats.ringbuffer.RowStatisticsRingBufferPayload;
045import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.Counter;
046import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Threads;
047import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
048import org.slf4j.Logger;
049import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
050
051import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.common.util.concurrent.ThreadFactoryBuilder;
052
053@InterfaceAudience.Private
054public final class RowStatisticsTableRecorder implements RowStatisticsRecorder {
055
056  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RowStatisticsTableRecorder.class);
057  // Must be multiple of 2. Should be greater than num regions/RS
058  private static final int DEFAULT_EVENT_COUNT = 1024;
059  private static final long DISRUPTOR_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_MS = 60_0000L;
060  private final BufferedMutator bufferedMutator;
061  private final Counter rowStatisticsDropped;
062  private final Disruptor<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope> disruptor;
063  private final RingBuffer<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope> ringBuffer;
064  private final AtomicBoolean closed;
065
066  /*
067   * This constructor is ONLY for testing. Use TableRecorder#forClusterConnection if you want to
068   * instantiate a TableRecorder object.
069   */
070  private RowStatisticsTableRecorder(BufferedMutator bufferedMutator,
071    Disruptor<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope> disruptor, Counter rowStatisticsDropped) {
072    this.bufferedMutator = bufferedMutator;
073    this.disruptor = disruptor;
074    this.ringBuffer = disruptor.getRingBuffer();
075    this.rowStatisticsDropped = rowStatisticsDropped;
076    this.closed = new AtomicBoolean(false);
077  }
078
079  public static RowStatisticsTableRecorder forClusterConnection(Connection clusterConnection,
080    Counter rowStatisticsDropped, Counter rowStatisticsPutFailed) {
081    BufferedMutator bufferedMutator =
082      initializeBufferedMutator(clusterConnection, rowStatisticsPutFailed);
083    if (bufferedMutator == null) {
084      return null;
085    }
086
087    Disruptor<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope> disruptor =
088      initializeDisruptor(bufferedMutator, rowStatisticsPutFailed);
089    disruptor.start();
090
091    return new RowStatisticsTableRecorder(bufferedMutator, disruptor, rowStatisticsDropped);
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public void record(RowStatisticsImpl rowStatistics, Optional<byte[]> fullRegionName) {
096    if (!closed.get()) {
097      if (
098        !ringBuffer.tryPublishEvent((envelope, seqId) -> envelope
099          .load(new RowStatisticsRingBufferPayload(rowStatistics, fullRegionName.get())))
100      ) {
101        rowStatisticsDropped.increment();
102        LOG.error("Failed to load row statistics for region={} into the ring buffer",
103          rowStatistics.getRegion());
104      }
105    } else {
106      rowStatisticsDropped.increment();
107      LOG.error("TableRecorder is closed. Will not record row statistics for region={}",
108        rowStatistics.getRegion());
109    }
110  }
111
112  public void close() throws IOException {
113    if (!closed.compareAndSet(false, true)) {
114      return;
115    }
116    try {
117      disruptor.shutdown(DISRUPTOR_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_MS, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
118    } catch (TimeoutException e) {
119      LOG.warn(
120        "Disruptor shutdown timed out after {} ms. Forcing halt. Some row statistics may be lost",
121        DISRUPTOR_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_MS);
122      disruptor.halt();
123      disruptor.shutdown();
124    }
125    bufferedMutator.close();
126  }
127
128  private static BufferedMutator initializeBufferedMutator(Connection conn,
129    Counter rowStatisticsPutFailed) {
130    Configuration conf = conn.getConfiguration();
131    TableRecorderExceptionListener exceptionListener =
132      new TableRecorderExceptionListener(rowStatisticsPutFailed);
133    BufferedMutatorParams params = new BufferedMutatorParams(NAMESPACED_TABLE_NAME)
134      .rpcTimeout(getInt(conf, HConstants.HBASE_RPC_TIMEOUT_KEY, 15_000))
135      .operationTimeout(getInt(conf, HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT, 30_000))
136      .setWriteBufferPeriodicFlushTimeoutMs(
137        getLong(conf, ConnectionConfiguration.WRITE_BUFFER_PERIODIC_FLUSH_TIMEOUT_MS, 60_000L))
138      .writeBufferSize(getLong(conf, ConnectionConfiguration.WRITE_BUFFER_SIZE_KEY,
139        ConnectionConfiguration.WRITE_BUFFER_SIZE_DEFAULT))
140      .listener(exceptionListener);
141    BufferedMutator bufferedMutator = null;
142    try {
143      bufferedMutator = conn.getBufferedMutator(params);
144    } catch (IOException e) {
145      LOG.error("This should NEVER print!", e);
146    }
147    return bufferedMutator;
148  }
149
150  private static Disruptor<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope>
151    initializeDisruptor(BufferedMutator bufferedMutator, Counter rowStatisticsPutFailures) {
152    Disruptor<RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope> disruptor =
153      new Disruptor<>(RowStatisticsRingBufferEnvelope::new, DEFAULT_EVENT_COUNT,
154        new ThreadFactoryBuilder().setNameFormat("rowstats.append-pool-%d").setDaemon(true)
155          .setUncaughtExceptionHandler(Threads.LOGGING_EXCEPTION_HANDLER).build(),
156        ProducerType.MULTI, new BlockingWaitStrategy());
157    disruptor.setDefaultExceptionHandler(new RowStatisticsDisruptorExceptionHandler());
158    RowStatisticsEventHandler rowStatisticsEventHandler =
159      new RowStatisticsEventHandler(bufferedMutator, rowStatisticsPutFailures);
160    disruptor.handleEventsWith(new RowStatisticsEventHandler[] { rowStatisticsEventHandler });
161    return disruptor;
162  }
163
164  protected static class TableRecorderExceptionListener
165    implements BufferedMutator.ExceptionListener {
166
167    private final Counter rowStatisticsPutFailures;
168
169    TableRecorderExceptionListener(Counter counter) {
170      this.rowStatisticsPutFailures = counter;
171    }
172
173    public void onException(RetriesExhaustedWithDetailsException exception,
174      BufferedMutator mutator) {
175      long failedPuts = mutator.getWriteBufferSize();
176      rowStatisticsPutFailures.increment(failedPuts);
177      LOG.error(
178        "Periodic flush of buffered mutator failed. Cannot persist {} row stats stored in buffer",
179        failedPuts, exception);
180    }
181  }
182}
